reviews.title: Can\'t read the Bible
reviews.comment: I did instal this in my Samsung Galaxy SII, but I can\'t read anything. Each latter just like a box. Can you try to fixed the problem please? I can be able to read then and will be very happy and thankfull to you. So please. Allah Bless You!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fulfill my desire
reviews.comment: Its really good to have Bible in bangla language. Its in uni codes format which is good. Until now its ok, at least I can read Bible in my own language in Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Andrew Adhikary
